Articles.Content:
Hello,

I've recently discovered the Andromeda Visuals mod that gives incredible graphics to KSP and which is often used in KSP videos on YT but I don't know why I actually don't find any link to download it.

Can anyone help me ?

Moving to Add-on Discussions.

1 hour ago, Tidearis said:

I don't know why I actually don't find any link to download it.

You can't find a download link because there isn't one.  It's been mothballed due to multiple, repeated license violations:  it bundled lots of other mods in direct violation of their license terms.  Therefore all download links have been removed, and won't be back until and unless the mod is cleaned up to properly respect others' licenses.  (This is prominently called out in the main post in the Andromeda Visuals thread.)

You can see details here:

On 10/7/2017 at 5:51 AM, Tidearis said:

Hello,

I've recently discovered the Andromeda Visuals mod that gives incredible graphics to KSP and which is often used in KSP videos on YT but I don't know why I actually don't find any link to download it.

Can anyone help me ?

Because of Andromeda's continual license violation, I'd recommend Stock Visual Enhancements, or (shameless plug) my own Astronomer's Visual Pack Repackaged, which Andromeda Visuals was identical to at one point.
